body.content:
*Dear Sir/ Madam,*











*Thank you for your mail and your willingness to support me and my children
in these hard times of our lives. I would like to explain in detail
concerning me and my kids. Let me start from my late husband’s family;
before we got married, we were faced with a lot of challenges because my
late husband is from Kumasi in the Ashanti Region and I am from the Volta
Region Aflao.These two regions find it difficult to marry from each region
because of the bitter history between them. But because of the love we had
for each other, we were able to get along and eventually we got married. My
late husband’s family did not support the marriage because they did not
like the region I came from. After we got married, we lived together in
Greater Accra in Asylum down where we had two beautiful kids. My husband
had a job and was working with AngloGold Ashanti in the Ashanti region
while me and our kids lived in Accra.After the death of my late husband,
the family of my late husband took some of my late husband’s properties as
their tradition demanded but my late husband was able to keep some Alluvial
Gold bars with a security company and some cash of which I have the deposit
certificate of both treasures but I cannot remember exactly how much it is,
except I send my son to check our old save boxes in the house. For now, I’m
at the hospital at Korle-Bu, a well known hospital in Ghana.I will
appreciate it if you can come to Ghana to meet with me and my kids if time
permits, so that I can know you in person before I die. I will like to know
your name too, where you are from so that I can be able to introduce you to
my family lawyer, my late husband his solidly behind our decisions and he
have been very helpful to us, all the necessary documents will be
transferred into your name to enable you claim to the treasure, because
that is what you will use in taking care of my children when I’m gone, the
doctor said in few months.If there is anything you would like to know,
don’t hesitate to ask me. The nurse who is helping me to type this mail
will be at work again on SaturdayThank you for your time. I am grateful.
Hoping to hear from you soon.*

*Yours sincerely,Gift  Aba.*

On Wed, Sep 8, 2021 at 2:52 AM <zack@asdfghjkl.ovh> wrote:

> Hello,
> how can I help you with this?
>
> Sincerely
> Zack
>
>

header.subject: Re: Hello, how can i help with this?
